mapper.insert: insert into market_config_partner (market_partner_id,market_info_order,market_info_change,market_info_refund,market_info_service) values (#{market_partner_id},#{market_info_order},#{market_info_change},#{market_info_refund},#{market_info_service}) on duplicate KEY update market_partner_id=#{market_partner_id}, market_info_order=#{market_info_order}, market_info_change=#{market_info_change}, market_info_refund=#{market_info_refund}, market_info_service=#{market_info_service}

insert into market_config (market_config_code,market_config_value,store_id) values (#{market_config_code},#{market_config_value},#{store_id}) on duplicate KEY update market_config_value = #{market_config_value}
